title: The Seventh continent (Anamorphic)
creator_credit: Jadran Film (Zagreb), Fimove Studio Koliba and Dusan Vukoric
brief_description: Two runaway children discover a magical island, the Seventh Continent. Soon, children of various nationalities and races come to the Seventh Continent where they create a new world of fun and fantasy far from adults. A Yugoslav-Czech co-production. In cinemascope - requires an anamorphic lense.
